Name: College Physics with MasteringPhysics and Pearson eText Student Access Code Card (9th Edition)

ReviewList.Text: None of the homework problem solutions are ever adequately demonstrated in this book, making it almost useless in terms of learning basic physics. Some potential uses are, dropping it and measuring its acceleration, tossing it in a river to observe reference frames, and calculating the angle and velocity you must throw it at to hit its author from 100 meters away while standing 30m above level ground.

I bought this ridiculously over-priced textbook for my university physics class, and find it virtually useless. The small font and busy page layout gives me a headache, and the problems presented in the book are no help in completing the assignments on the Mastering Physics website. I am spending hours searching for help on the web, and have purchased Physics for Dummies, which is a much greater help.

Can't even understand this book, but it was required for class. I do not even understand why this book was made or who approved it to be used in an educational setting such as a college or university class. TERRIBLE BOOK. I feel that I learned more from youtube and other review books than this crappy book that I spent so much money on. NEVER purchasing again.
My order arrived without the mastering physics access code card that was supposed to be included. i flipped through all the pages and it wasn't there.
FYI this book is not paperback it is lose leaf. I don't mind either way because I'm a physics major and plan on keeping it but be warned it needs to be put in a binder. Came with the access code.

I purchase the Pearson textbook with access code to utilize with my online course.  The access code did not work and I was forced to purchase a separate code through the Pearson website.  Thankfully Amazon did refund me some money.
This book is a piece of crap. Nothing is explained clearly and concisely so that one who does not have knowledge in the subject can pick up on it.
I thought it was going to come with mastering physics etext, as in with an access code. But, only the book came!!!!!! D:<
Access card did not work, how do I get a refund for this part of the book?

Not as advertised in heading, did not have the Access Card.  It did however state that in the notes, but the heading was misleading and you cannot use the book without the Access Card.  Had to ship it back twice because I was given the wrong shipping address and was only reimbursed for the cost of the book.
It does't explain problems as well as it could. It does provide sufficient practice problems. So far only read through first chapter.

I decided to review this product because I think that the first review was not accurate.  This book made learning physics easy.  The layout is fine, the book breaks down every concept to an understandable level without using calculus.  The examples in the book help one to understand fully, the concepts in each chapter.  I would highly reccommend this book t anyone. The price is way to high for textbooks these days, I feel that $150 for any book is way to expensive.
The book was in great conditions and it arrived on time! The textbook for physics and it was wrapped with the mastering physics, it was all new.
My items came in pretty fast. It was nicely packaged in a box and the item was also packaged well so papers don't fly everywhere. Thank you.
I am a very happy customer, everything showed up exactly as expected and in good time. You can trust these guys.
This product was new, but the corners were damaged and the spine had a cut in it, further damaging it.

This package included a brand new book and online access code with ebook for a very cheap deal!! Normally a used book would be around 100 dollars + the access code for 95 with the ebook. I would definitely recommend get this deal.

The book came right on time and came in perfect condition. It was in bubble wrap and also shrink wrapped for ultimate protection. It also had the Mastering Physics which brings the etext along with it! the price was completely worth it!
